page.title: 14A Day in My Life.M,Greer.
page.content: I get up at 8.00 and for breakfast I have some Shreddies.I go to school on my bicycle.When I get there I play with my friends till 9.00.We have assembly first then do Mathematics until playtime.At playtime we usually play tig for 15 minutes.After play we have a talk given by a child about something they are interested in.After that we have singing.At 12.00 we have to get the classroom ready for dinners which come in containers from Balderton.Dinner lasts about an hour.Afterwards we play football. Rev.Briggs takes us for Football.After that we usually do our History project.At 3.30 we go home.When I get home I play with my friend Simon.We play tig.After tig I watch TV until teatime.After tea I watch TV,read,or play on my computer.I go to bed at 9.00.
